slide.title: Two pink-clad stilt walkers lead the
Five women, holding crests, honoured for their contributions to society by cultural organisation Drishti at Theatre Institute in Chittagong city. Photo: Star, BSS
Indigenous women perform native dance at Central Shaheed Minar in the capital. Photo: Star, BSS
Female rowers compete in a boat race, a tradition long dominated by men, in the Poisarhat river in Barisal. Photo: Star, BSS
Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina feels the texture of clothes produced by women at the capital's Bangabandhu International Conference before opening a women's day programme there. Photo: Star, BSS
Rights activists gather in a rally in front of the National Museum. Photo: Star, BSS
Human chain by Garment and Industrial Workers Federation in front of Jatiya Press Club. Photo: Star, BSS
Jatiya Garhasthya Nari Sramik Union, an association of domestic workers, forms a human chain in the same area. Photo: Star, BSS
Torch procession by Biplobi Nari Sanghati at Shahbagh. Photo: Star, BSS
